scripts.prestashop-setup: composer prestashop-setup-core && composer prestashop-setup-theme && composer prestashop-setup-clean && composer prestashop-setup-welcome
scripts.prestashop-setup-theme: cp -r themes/$PRESTASHOP_THEME_NAME/modules/* store/modules/ & cp -r themes/$PRESTASHOP_THEME_NAME/themes/* store/themes/ & cp themes/$PRESTASHOP_THEME_NAME/Config.xml store/config/xml/themes/$PRESTASHOP_THEME_NAME.xml
scripts.prestashop-setup-clean: mv store/install/ store/archived/ & mv store/admin/ store/backoffice/ & cp settings.inc.php store/config/
prestashop-setup-welcome: echo 'It works! Please see prestashop-12factor on GitHub for info and post-install instructions.'
